question: Who are the 5 defensive midfielders with the highest pass completion rate, taller than 180 cm, and worth under 2 million euros?
expected_players: Julian Weigl, Rodrigo Hernández Cascante, José Vicente Gómez Umpiérrez, Seydou Keita, Joan Jordán Moreno
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.height_cm, p.value_eur, s.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'defensive midfield'
  AND p.height_cm > 180
  AND p.value_eur < 2000000
ORDER BY s.pass_completion_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 5 center midfielders under 26 with the highest progressive carries per 90 minutes.
expected_players: László Kleinheisler, Panagiotis Giorgios Kone, Cameron Brannagan, İlkay Gündoğan, Panagiotis Tachtsidis
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.progressive_carries_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND p.age < 26
ORDER BY s.progressive_carries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the 5 strikers with the most non-blocked shots per 90 minutes and a value below 10 million euros.
expected_players: Marcello Trotta, Nikica Jelavić, Francesco Totti, Florian Niederlechner, Alberto Mateus Contreiras Gonçalves
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.value_eur, s.non_blocked_shots_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
  AND p.value_eur < 10000000
ORDER BY s.non_blocked_shots_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me the 5 center backs with the highest number of ball recoveries per 90 minutes, aged 28 or older.
expected_players: Medhi Amine El Mouttaqi Benatia, Dario Dainelli, Giovanni Marchese, Vasyl Pryyma, João Miranda de Souza Filho
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.ball_recoveries_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center back'
  AND p.age >= 28
ORDER BY s.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find the top 5 offensive midfielders with the most chances created per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Alexander Baumjohann, Miloš Jojić, Kevin-Prince Boateng, Mesut Özil, Allan Saint-Maximin
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.chances_created_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
ORDER BY s.chances_created_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me 5 side backs under 25 years old with the highest number of crosses per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Federico Mattiello, Davide Zappacosta, Kieran Trippier, Gilberto Moraes Junior, Alex Sandro Lobo Silva
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.crosses_total_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'side back'
  AND p.age < 25
ORDER BY s.crosses_total_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find the top 5 goalkeepers with the highest save percentage, considering only those who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Jan Oblak, Gianluigi Buffon, Claudio Andrés Bravo Muñoz, Manuel Neuer, Koen Casteels
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.save_percentage
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'goalkeeper'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.save_percentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: List the top 5 wingers with the highest shot accuracy, who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Gerard Deulofeu Lázaro, Andros Townsend, Wayne Routledge, Aaron Lennon, Lucas Vázquez Iglesias
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me 4 attacking midfielders under 24 years old with the highest number of key passes per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).
expected_players: Hiroshi Kiyotake, Nadiem Amiri, Riccardo Saponara, Marco Asensio Willemsen
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC
LIMIT 4;

question: Find 6 central midfielders with the highest number of progressive passes completed per 90 and key passes per 90, who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Andrés Iniesta Luján, Thiago Alcântara do Nascimento, İlkay Gündoğan, Michael Carrick, Luka Modrić, Marcelo Brozović
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.progressive_passes_completed_per90, s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.progressive_passes_completed_per90 DESC, s.key_passes_per90 DESC
LIMIT 6;

question: Give me 3 strikers under 25 years old with the highest number of goals per 90 and the best shot accuracy, who have played more than 850 minutes.

sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.goals_scored_per90, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
  AND p.age < 25
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.goals_scored_per90 DESC, s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Find 4 center backs worth less than 4 million euros with the highest number of interceptions and clearances per 90 minutes (only players with more than 850 minutes played).

  AND p.value_eur < 4000000
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.interceptions_per90 DESC, s.clearances_per90 DESC
LIMIT 4;

question: List 5 side backs who have completed the most progressive carries and dribbles per 90 minutes, with more than 850 minutes played.

LIMIT 5;

question: Find 3 wingers under 24 years old, valued under 6 million euros, who have the highest number of progressive carries, key passes, and shot accuracy per 90 minutes. Only include players with more than 850 minutes played.
expected_players: Jordon Ibe, Andros Townsend, Carlos Joaquín Correa
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, p.value_eur,
       s.progressive_carries_per90, s.key_passes_per90, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND p.value_eur < 6000000
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.progressive_carries_per90 DESC,
         s.key_passes_per90 DESC,
         s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Find 4 defensive midfielders with the highest duel success rate and the lowest number of fouls committed per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).

sql:

WHERE p.main_position = 'defensive midfield'

ORDER BY s.duel_success_rate DESC, s.fouls_committed_per90 ASC

question: Show me 5 goalkeepers under 24 years old with the highest penalty save percentage and total saves per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).

question: Find 3 center midfielders under 26 years old, with more than 850 minutes played, who rank highest in progressive passes completed, goal assists, ball recoveries per 90, and who also commit fewer than 1.5 fouls per 90.
expected_players: İlkay Gündoğan, James David Rodríguez Rubio, Pascal Groß
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.progressive_passes_completed_per90,
       s.goal_assists_per90, s.ball_recoveries_per90, s.fouls_committed_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND p.age < 26
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
  AND s.fouls_committed_per90 < 1.5
ORDER BY s.progressive_passes_completed_per90 DESC,
         s.goal_assists_per90 DESC,
         s.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Show me the 5 most valuable players from Valencia with the highest number of key passes per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).
expected_players: Sofiane Feghouli, Rodrigo Moreno Machado, Daniel Parejo Muñoz, Álvaro Negredo Sánchez, Francisco Alcácer García
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.value_eur,
       s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE t.team = 'Valencia'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC, p.value_eur DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the top 5 rated players from Athletic Club, excluding those without a valid rating.
expected_players: Íñigo Lekue Martínez, Beñat Etxebarria Urkiaga, Iñaki Williams Arthuer, Gorka Iraizoz Moreno, Óscar de Marcos Arana
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.rating
FROM player_profile p
JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE t.team = 'Athletic Club'
  AND p.rating ~ '^[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)?$'
ORDER BY CAST(p.rating AS FLOAT) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the profile of Iñaki Williams Arthuer, including his position, age, minutes played and goals per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Iñaki Williams Arthuer
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.minutes_played, s.goals_scored_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.player_name = 'Iñaki Williams Arthuer';

question: Give me Lionel Messi’s age, position, number of key passes per 90 minutes and goals scored per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, 
       s.key_passes_per90, s.goals_scored_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.player_name = 'Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini';

question: What is the age, position, shot accuracy and non-blocked shots per 90 minutes of Robert Lewandowski?
expected_players: Robert Lewandowski
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, 
       s.shot_accuracy, s.non_blocked_shots_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.player_name = 'Robert Lewandowski';

question: Show me the offensive midfielders under 24 years old, with a value below 3 million euros, who have the most key passes per 90 and chances created per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Allan Saint-Maximin, Hiroshi Kiyotake, Kevin Lasagna, Nadiem Amiri, Marco Jhonfai Fabián De La Mora
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, p.value_eur,
       s.key_passes_per90, s.chances_created_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND p.value_eur < 3000000
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC, s.chances_created_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the 5 defensive midfielders under 24 years old who have played more than 1000 minutes.
expected_players: Eric Dier, Fernando Lucas Martins, Gonzalo Escalante, Jorge Luiz Frello Filho, Amadou Diawara
sql_query:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name, 
    pp.main_position, 
    pp.age, 
    ps.minutes_played
FROM 
    player_profile pp
JOIN 
    player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
WHERE 
    pp.main_position = 'defensive midfield' 
    AND pp.age < 24 
    AND ps.minutes_played > 1000
ORDER BY 
    ps.minutes_played DESC
LIMIT 5;
